description:
If you live in Pittsburgh or anywhere in western Pennsylvania and you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions, you can turn to the legal professionals at The Trapani Law Firm for the dedicated advocacy and support you need.

Over our history, our law firm's attorneys have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients throughout the state. Through this success, we have earned a lifetime membership with both the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates forums. While we cannot guarantee a specific outcome regarding your case, we can promise that we will do all we can to help increase your chances of resolving your matter quickly and securing the maximum compensation you deserve.

This unwavering dedication to our clients has helped establish our reputation as a law firm that cares, and our attorneys have received many positive reviews and referrals from our clients as well as numerous awards and honors from our peers. As further evidence of our commitment to providing the highest level of support to those we serve, we offer free initial consultations, and we will gladly meet with you at your home or hospital room if you cannot make it to our office.

Working on a contingency basis, we will not require a fee unless we win your case, so you have nothing to lose by contacting The Trapani Law Firm to see what we can do to increase your chances of securing a brighter future for yourself and your loved ones.
